hadiths.text: It was narrated from Sahl bin Sa’d that the Prophet (ﷺ) said:“In Paradise there is a gate called Rayyan. On the Day of Resurrection the call will go out saying: ‘Where are those who used to fast?’ Whoever is among those who used to fast will enter it, and whoever enters it will never experience thirst again.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي فَضْلِ الصِّيَامِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the virtues of fasting
